Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.HandRelated

Class HandGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.HandRelated.HandGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class HandGUI extends Object implements Observer
This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing the hand of the player and the secret objective.

    • addHandTo

      public void addHandTo(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane parent)
      Adds the hand to the given parent
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent to add the hand to

    • addCardToHand

      public void addCardToHand(FlippablePlayableCard card, boolean draggable)
      Finds first empty spot in the hand and adds a card there. The card will be draggable if the draggable parameter is true. If the hand is full, an IllegalStateException will be thrown. All the listeners of the user interaction with the card will be added.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add to the hand.
      draggable - whether the card should be draggable or not.

    • removeCardFromHand

      public void removeCardFromHand(FlippablePlayableCard card)
      Removes the given card from the hand.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to remove from the hand.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the hand to reflect the current state of the light model. This method is called by the observer pattern.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer

    • setCodex

      public void setCodex(CodexGUI codex)
      Sets the codex of the hand.
      Parameters:
      codex - the codex of the hand.
